code: import React from'react';import'./product.css';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{addToCart,loadCurrentItem}from'../../../redux/shopping/shopping_actions';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux/es/exports';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Product=function Product(_ref){var productData=_ref.productData;var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:productData.img,className:"product_size",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product_desc",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:productData.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:productData.desc}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["$",productData.price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list_btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(productData.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){dispatch(loadCurrentItem(productData));},children:"View Item"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add_btn",onClick:function onClick(){return dispatch(addToCart(productData.id));},children:"Add To Cart"})]})]});};export default Product;
